word: We are not to say or do anything that would unnecessarily close up our way. We are to go forward in Christ’s name, advocating the truths committed to us. If we are forbidden by others to do this work, then we may say, as did the apostles, . . . “We cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard” (Acts 4:20).—The Acts of the Apostles, pp. 68, 69.
